meanings.sent1: Her overspeculations about the weather made her anxious.
meanings.sent2: The overspeculations about the stock market led to confusion.
meanings.sent3: His overspeculations about aliens visiting Earth were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The overspeculations about the treasure buried in the backyard were like a wild adventure.
meanings.sent5: The overspeculations about the upcoming party were buzzing in her mind all day.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in too many speculations.
meanings.sent1: The overspeculations of the students in the classroom disrupted the lesson.
meanings.sent2: His overspeculations during the meeting caused delays.
meanings.sent3: The overspeculations of the cat chasing its tail never failed to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her overspeculations in the game of chess were like a player lost in a maze.
meanings.sent5: The overspeculations of the detective were crucial in solving the mystery.
